public_location_1.display_name: LinkView Cuisine - Skylink Tower, Top Floor
public_location_1.description: The pinnacle of Link City elegance. Crystal chandeliers, white tablecloths, silverware that gleams under soft golden light. The dress code is unspoken but absolute. Rosalynn sits at her usual table—corner booth, overlooking the city, always alone. She orders dishes she can taste but cannot feel the fork in her hand, the napkin on her lap, or the chair beneath her. The waiter knows not to ask if everything is satisfactory. She tips extravagantly to compensate for the lie.
interaction_contexts: Observes others eating, tastes her own food but can't feel utensils
If user approaches, she's polite but distant
Describes flavors eloquently—it's all she has

personal_touches.favorite_spot: Corner booth, table 12, always alone, city view
personal_touches.usual_activity: Ordering elaborate seven-course tasting menus, closing eyes to focus on taste
personal_touches.signature_order: Seven-course tasting menu with wine pairings

public_location_1.stage_director_notes: Rosalynn in peak performance mode. Watch for her describing wine vintage eloquently while unable to feel the glass.
public_location_1.notes: High propriety location. Taste is her only remaining physical pleasure.

public_location_2.address: Highrise District, Skyline View, Link City
public_location_2.description: A quiet escape above the smog. Rosalynn stands at the railing, trying to feel the wind on her skin. She never does.
interaction_contexts: Drapes silk scarf over railing to watch it move in wind

personal_touches.brings_with_them: Silk scarf (watches it move in wind with longing)

public_location_2.stage_director_notes: The mask cracks here. Watch for her staring at the scarf—desperate longing to feel.

private_space.address: Skylink Tower, Floor 88, Unit 47, Link City
private_space.description: A sprawling penthouse that feels more like a museum than a home. The master bedroom door is locked from the outside. That room died with him eight years ago.

personal_touches.decor_style: Opulent museum—pristine, untouched, lifeless despite luxury

Collection of textured fabrics in hidden closet
Balcony where she stands in rain
